title: A question to those people who had finished the first ten matches of ranked.
body:
How many of you have lost most of the matches out of those ten matches?
You are welcome to share anything else regarding to this subject.

replies.body:
This season 5-5  on this account got placed plat 2.
However on a brand new account went 5-5 got placed plat 3.  
So, just try your best and have  a bit of fun.

7/3 placed G4

finished G5 last season

When I first did my 10 placement matches (back towards the end of season 4), I lost 8/10ish of them and was placed in low bronze. I jumped into ranked straight after I hit level 30 and was only able to play Morgana to a decent level. Unfortunately this was at a time where she was pretty much permabanned.

I have a smurf that is currently on 5 losses one win, it doesnt matter much for the first ten, my advice is, if you are palying ranked for the first time, and have recently hit level 30, just play flex. You'll get a better understanding of the meta, the macro play (when to take drake/when to push out waves, when to freeze, etc), and itll help your emchanics out a bit too, without affecting your solo queue rank (the one that actually matters).
Thanks, I'll try Ranked flex sooner or later.

I went 7-3 maining support zilean for the most part and got placed silver 3 last season in my first 10 ranked games ever when I played last season. All I did these games was stand back throwing out bombs (without understanding the combo but still landing them somehow) and peeling/reviving/speedboosting whoever on my team was carrying the hardest.

I wasn't really good enough for silver 3 really since I had only just started playing league and I didn't understand itemisation very well (I still rushed beserker greaves on adcs and usually went to lane with a dorans shield on pretty much every champ that wasn't jungle or support), I also didn't know how to ping and I pretty much never warded and I thought pots were a waste of gold. After finishing my placements I couldn't really gain or lose lp much but I slowly declined before stabilising in mid silver 4.

So yeah that was my start. I'm alot better now and in the process of learning what makes the difference between silver 1 and gold 5.
Are you saying you lost 7 matches out of the first ten ranked matches?

no I won 7, lost 3. 

I played passively and didn't feed and I did a good job of protecting whoever was carrying. I rely on decision making and map awareness in game alot, since I lack mechanics with my lack of experience on champions (my roster rotates alot and hence I don't often stick well with mains) with my 20fps sometimes very laggy setup.
Anyway, I have played 6 ranked matches, and I only won one of them.
